oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Environmental impacts of embedded bathroom practices
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Quitzau, Maj-Britt
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Consumer issues
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The presentation discuss different environmental impacts related to embedded bathroom practices.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Quitzau, Maj-Britt (2005) Environmental impacts of embedded bathroom practices. Speech at: Kitchen and bathrooms: Changing technologies, practices and social organisation - implications for sustainability, CRIC, University of Manchester, England, 27-28 January 2005.
